cleaned_text: Do you need pain relief? Your first inclination may be to reach for the medication bottle. You may even start seriously thinking about surgery. There are holistic paths to wellness that can work just as well, if not even better, than some surgical procedures. For instance, by combining essential oils with chiropractic care, your pain levels may drop considerably. These oils are sourced from plants, including the flowers, roots, stem, bark, and seeds. They're considered volatile aromatic compounds, meaning that depending on the temperature, they may be a liquid or a solid. When used with chiropractic techniques, these oils will be in liquid form. Examples of these oils include wintergreen, tea tree oil, star anise oil, sandalwood, rosemary, nutmeg oil, lemongrass, jasmine oil, ginger oil, and basil oil. Depending on which essential oil is used, it will have different healing effects. These include: When combined with chiropractic care, essential oils can trigger healing and soothe a patient's senses. If they were nervous about seeing a chiropractor for the first time, these pleasing oils should help them unwind. Besides that, these oils can reduce bodily pain and improve poor circulation. Your chiropractor may favor one type of oil or several. Are you looking for holistic pain relief and wellness?
